title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P 500 nears record on U.S.-China trade report
text:
US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P 500 nears record on U.S.-China trade report

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 25, 2019 21:00)

© Reuters. US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P 500 nears record on U.S.-China trade report Oct 25 (Reuters) - The S&P 500 inched closer to a record high on Friday after a CNBC report that the United States and China were close to finalizing some sections of a trade agreement after a phone call between top negotiators. 11:24 a.m. ET, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 188.84 points, or 0.70%, at 26,994.37, the S&P 500 was up 14.36 points, or 0.48%, at 3,024.65. The Nasdaq Composite was up 51.52 points, or 0.63%, at 8,237.32.

US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-S&P 500 nears record on U.S.-China trade report
